name: QA automation engineer (Python) | Remote
description:
LATOKEN exchange has 2 million accounts including 900k+ users of our Android app rated 4.4 by 25+ thousands of reviews. We leverage the next tech to make account opening as easy as Instagram. The technology and our Olympic sports culture can make us the first billion users digital wallet needed to free people to manage their financial life.

Today, is a great moment to join us as crypto is expanding into mainstream financial market and ex CFO of JP Morgan joined our advisory board and 2 presidents joined us in Davos.

Here is our backlog.

Role: QA automation engineer.

Unit: OPERATIONS.

Role Mission: Bug-free and user-friendly Platform Ops.

Details:

  • Story: Teammates need bug-free and user-friendly Platform Ops to be guided, trained, onboarded, laser-focused and receive feedback on their mission
  • Key PROBLEM's: Daily sessions without crashes and ANRs > 99.9% - average in Q4
    Defects reported by teammates <10 in Q4
  • How: Execute manual testing.
    Create auto test cases, bug reports & follow-ups.
    Propose UI / UX improvements
  • Constraints: No use-cases without test-case coverage.
    Release candidate smoke testing <1 hr.


Main performance number: Platform usability.
Second performance number: Bugs on production.
Third performance number: Latency of orgstructure.

Responsibilities:

  • Coordinate : Create workshops, explain processes, ensure cross-unit communication, cross-unit pollination.
  • Acceptance Processes : Create acceptance testing processes, using performance- and regression testing.
  • Support Releases : Monitor the running (pre-)releases, checking for bugs, faulty parameters and unclear processes.
  • Uptime : Exchange is 99.999% of time available and downtime is well planned and explained to users.
  • Grow Team : Ensure meritocracy and growth of top talent: interview, hire, onboard, mentor, promote or fire.
  • Vision : Know and explain to teammates how their stories build great product. Have a backlog vision for 3-6-60 months.
  • Report : Set alerts, monitor and report key platform metrics: downtime, latency, other performance metrics.
  • Research : Take the best which the industry has, and improve it by research and development (in API, processes, products, benchmarks, etc.).
  • Create QA Processes : Create the cross-unit processes allowing releases to be consistent and bug-free.

Requirement skills and experience:

  • Knowledge of testing methodologies, software development life cycle.
  • Knowledge ﻿python with ﻿selenium (API test, ﻿AUTO test, ﻿unity test)
  • Experience in writing test cases, checklists, test scenarios.
  • Experience with reading software code in one or more languages such as Java, Python, C#, C++, JS(with React.JS);
  • Understanding of test design principles.
  • Experience in testing mobile apps (iOS, Android) and web apps.
  • Knowledge of client-server model, REST API, GET/POST requests, JSON, XML.
  • Experience in TestRail, JIRA, Postman.
  • Ability to use developer tools in Android devices, web browsers.
  • Experience in Android Studio, Xcode.
  • Ability to perform simple SQL requests (select, update, etc.).

Will be a strong plus:

  • Experience as a trader in banking or finance.
  • Knowledge of Git / python / kubernetes / rancher / Grafana dashboards.
  • Graduated from top university.

Participant in regional level of olympiad competitions or other relevant QA certificates.


Why LATOKEN:

  • Build the future. Level up the financial system. Put it at fingertips, so everybody can use the money to build and be a stakeholder of the future.
  • Culture. Level up your and our culture until we and the world have advancement in culture deserving be spread with our products. We call it visionary doers culture.
  • Raise the bar. Any hire raises our bar, and you will be the bar raiser for us and newcomers.
  • Be stakeholder. You build a product helping people's success. People pay for it and you get a stake of these future payments as a LATOKEN shareholder.
  • Lead. We are the largest in the world "IPO" platform for digital assets.

  • Feel a great fit - apply now or forward to a great candidate.

    https://latoken.com/ru/careers
    You will receive 100*[your salary] in stock option value in dollars. You can earn a lot if you put clients first, want, and capable to make the world better with the new technology.


    Feel a great fit - apply now or forward to a great candidate.
